name: Rhythm Bandit
description:
Get to the exit with as many items as you can. The more you pick up, the slower you'll be!

Controls

Hold WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Enter/Space - Start

Escape - Restart

Ludum Dare Page

@fashionbatman

Download Music Here

Game made in Unity

Music made in FL  Studio with a PO-12 and PO-20

Pick up sound made with ChipTone

Art made in Gimp 2
